description:
Realizing that she could save many people with her powers, Tsugumi has begun her work as a member of Fukurou. However, when she is having a meal with Hayato and the others at the end of their rounds, they hear a ruckus outside. A group called "Kagutsuchi" appears that plunders books from citizens and burns them on the spot. Sagisawa Rui, a victim who had a precious book burned, asks Tsugumi for her help in resolving this problem. He says that rumors are spreading of strange books such as the one that caused the Prime Minister`s son to commit suicide.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honoo no Kami o Nanoru Mono: Kagutsuchi
Those Who Take the Name of the God of Flames: Kagutsuchi
焔の神を名乗る者 -カグツチ-
